comment: Do not take him if you can help it. Has lots of assignments and barely any instructions on how to do them. I took him online this semester bc of covid and he was no help whatsoever. One of the toughest graders.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Professor Brooks had the worst grading system ever. He was so unclear about things even when you asked him about it. I ended the course with an 89.4 and he would not round up even though we had to switch to an online class mid semester due to covid. He is not understanding in anyway and even gave more work during this. I worked way too hard for a B

Let me start off by saying multiple peers of mine changed their majors after taking this course. This is probably the worst professor I have ever taken. Literally, this professor made a student cry and would make degrading remarks. Not understanding in the slightest. Super tough grader. DO NOT TAKE HIM. Had multiple class mates make 69.8, failed.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Prof Brooks was probably the worst prof I've ever had. He said he rarely gives out A's and his grading is ARBITRARY. I even wrote to the dean of communications regarding his grading. I am a straight A & B student so this class was a great example of the prof making the content harder than it needed to be. DO NOT TAKE. So not worth it.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Brooks is a great guy, just not a great professor. He is such a tough grader, there is either a quiz or test every week, sometimes both. All we do in class is go over homework, so to learn any new material, you have to teach yourself. Biggest advice is to do every single homework assignment (there is homework every night)it will save you

Prof. Brooks is awesome. He makes a boring subject a lot of fun. He does give homework pretty much every night and regular exams, but nothing that you cant handle. Hes very understanding and always responds to emails quickly.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Professor Brooks clearly enjoys the subject he teaches about and that's great. However, he gives daily homework and is an extremely tough grader, even for students who consider themselves relatively proficient in writing. The class is fairly interesting, although some days all we did was go over the homework for the whole class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: every chapter has a quiz, they're easy if you read. he is a tough grader, but gives great feedback. Prof Brooks is a great professor.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: I was scared for this class after reading all of the reviews lol. I didn't think this class was too hard because I love to write. But ofcourse if you're not a writer this class could be irritating. It's news writing so the style is very specific & not a whole lot of creativity is required. Brooks is a tough grader but he has to be given the subject
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Hilarious professor, even when not meaning to be. I had heard of many people complaining how boring Com 2135 could be, but with him I looked forward to class! He is a tough grader and isn't afraid to call you out for your mistakes. However, he teaches you so much and truly cares about his students learning. I would definitely take him again!

Professor Brooks is a great professor. He is very knowledgable about the material and has a ton of experience in the actual field of communications. It is obvious he wants his students to really know the material. The class itself is work heavy but he is very open to explain things and if you put in the effort it won't go unnoticed by him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This class is challenging because you're learning a new style of writing. Brooks is a little unclear about grading but if he can tell you put in effort, you'll get the credit even if you did the assignment wrong. GO TO CLASS AND DO THE HOMEWORK! Those points really add up. He's a good professor and will explain things again if you need him to.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Brooks is a very good professor and teaches the lessons very clearly. I learned a lot in his class. HOWEVER, he is not afraid to humiliate you in front of the whole class if you did something wrong on an assignment. VERY strict on attendance. Lots of homework. Overall he is fine but not my first choice.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: He keeps you on your toes, does not think twice about what he says but he is a good teacher. He is worth all the hard work you put in and gives good feedback. All the text books are necessary and if you study a little, you shouldn't have a problem passing the quizzes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This course is wicked hard. But Brooks will help you as much as you want to be helped. If you work for him, he will work for you. Not an easy A. But you will learn alot and will be prepared to move forward in major. Theres is no better Writing for Public Com proffesor at KSU.

Makes writing for communications a living hell, does not think twice before failing every single thing you turn in, not merciful whatsoever and welcomed students to drop his class. Not a supporter of easy grades but this class was ridiculous.
Amazing professor. The class itself is hard as crap so it's not his fault. There is a lot of homework, but it really is all necessary if you are a Com major. Do all the homework, and study a little.

on the 1st day of class, i assumed i would not enjoy his class. but he is honestly a GREAT guy & a great teacher. VERY patient, and grades fairly. you DO need to go to class & practice to be successful but the class isn't necessarily hard. he gives A LOT of homework. all in all, his class is easily my favorite class this semester.

Professor Brooks is great. The course itself isn't a cake because you have to really practice and get better at the specific writing, but the book is extremely helpful and he will help with any questions or concerns you have. Take him. He jokes and keeps class light hearted and fun. I would definitley take him again.

professor brooks is a nice guy. i can understand how he rubs some people the wrong way, but he's a nice guy. the class had a lot of work and tests. since most of the tests are article writing, you either do well or you don't. there are people who can write and people who can't. the class was tedious, boring (most was common sense), but an easy pass
The class is easy if you pay attention and do your HW. You use the books everyday in class and for HW. He is very knowledgeable and I would recommend him.
